bug.author: ohsewon
bug.summary: [GUI Tool] pipeviz is not compatible with tensor_* filters.
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.sec.samsung.net/myungjoo-ham></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
If we add tensor_converter (other tensor_* filters are not tested) into a pipeviz ( <denchmark-link:https://github.com/virinext/pipeviz>https://github.com/virinext/pipeviz</denchmark-link> ) gstreamer pipeline, we soon get: <denchmark-code>mzx@kohaku:/source/AutoDrv/pipeviz$ ./pipeviz --gst-plugin-path ../NNStreamer/build/gst/tensor_converter/:../NNStreamer/build/gst/tensor_filter/:../NNStreamer/build/gst/tensor_decoder/ failed to get the current screen resources QXcbConnection: XCB error: 170 (Unknown), sequence: 163, resource id: 90, major code: 146 (Unknown), minor code: 20 Segmentation fault (core dumped) mzx@kohaku:/source/AutoDrv/pipeviz$ </denchmark-code>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.sec.samsung.net/git-bot-sec></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/343>#343</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.sec.samsung.net/jinhyuck83-park></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
this segmentation fault is caused because there is no data GstTensor_Filter_Framework *fw in gst_tensor_filter_property_process function. in case of nnstreamer filter example(working), example app loads tensorflow-lite model, and use filter with tensorflow-lite but pipeviz, there is no steps to load which nnframework sub-plugin filter use . so I think there are two possible cadidates to use pipeviz with our nnstreamer. case 1. Make own complete filter that loads specific nnstreamer data model. Pros : no need to modify pipeviz Cons: have to make every filters with every nnframework case 2. Modify pipeviz that allows filter could load nnframework and load data model. Pros: no need to make every filters that suits for every specific nnframework(tensorflow, tensorflow-lite,caffe ...) Cons: need to modify pipeviz and don't know it would really works

when running Pipeviz, all elements are in run-time. so when changing tensor filter's property, set property is called while run-time. but currently, tensor filter's set property method does not allows set property in run-time with assertion codes. so will be considered allow set property while run-time when pipeviz runnig mode.
